content.intro: Our government's vision is to modernize and provide quality education for all that is globally comparable through strategic reforms.
content.description: The National Department of Education (NDoE) is glad to continue to provide Grade 10 and Grade 12 Student's National Examination Results for 2024. Every student and parent can go online now to access their examination results in real time.
content.title: NATIONAL EXAMINATION RESULTS - 2024
content.subtitle: Department Of Education
